name: Escape From Kabuck Town
description:
NIGHT TOWN MELTDOWN

Pienna is just an ordinary girl working for the bar which is so called "concept cafe" in Kabuck Town, the most terrible place of The Far East Country. On the way to go back her home, too many drunken guys are blocking on her path, and interrupting her so hard. Leave from this chaotic town to escape from the madness.
